quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: And if they’re already twisting records now, what happens in court later?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: That’s why it’s important to keep everything documented, so we can challenge it if needed.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But they’re the ones holding the official file, not me.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and that’s why I keep a record on my side as well, to compare.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Still, it feels like the odds are stacked against me.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand. It does feel very unfair.

contradictions.issue: Victim warns twisted records risk court misuse; advocate frames documentation as protection but systemic power imbalance remains
